posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a low grade Hobby "no stats" version, from authentic - VG-EX condition.  I was hoping that REA would have one in this auction, but no such luck.

If anyone is looking to put a little cash in their pocket to replenish their savings from the recent REA , just let me know.

r/
Frank
No one has one to sell?

With that type of scratch I would scratch out the stats and make my Hobby your Hobby...just don't get it graded.

Just wanted to write that sentence...best of luck getting a handle on your Hobby.

Brian

It seems like it would be easier to buy one with the stats than having to write them in yourself.

Good luck!
Geno

Thanks Sean & Geno.  Mental note to myself, only buy commons from Brian ;)

Anyone need to replenish their savings from the recent auctions?

I'm not picky, just as long as it isn't the Cycle "no stats" version :D

r/
Frank
